level.heading: Authority to obtain law enforcement records.
level.text: Upon request by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia, the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia may provide information related to a drug-, firearm-, or prostitution-related property that has been obtained from a law enforcement agency.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 42-815.02.
